snippet: The company said gains in revenue offset weaker results in its insurance units, and it reported cash holdings of $47.78 billion.
abstract: Berkshire Hathaway reports third-quarter profit rose as strength in railroad and utility businesses, as well as investment gains, offset weaker results in its insurance units; Berkshire earned $3.92 billion, or $2,373 per Class A share, in contrast to $2.28 billion, or $1,380 per share, a year earlier.
lead_paragraph: The company said gains in revenue offset weaker results in its insurance units, and it reported cash holdings of $47.78 billion.

headline.main: Railroads and Utilities Lift Earnings for Berkshire Hathaway
headline.print_headline: Railroads and Utilities Lift Earnings for Berkshire Hathaway
